price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ndamutse nyobye, naba nyobye ku bwanjye; ariko ninyoboka, bizaba bitewe n’ibyo Nyagasani wanjye yampishuriye. Mu by’ukuri We ni Uwumva bihebuje, uri hafi (ya byose).”
arabic: قُلۡ إِن ضَلَلۡتُ فَإِنَّمَآ أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِيۖ وَإِنِ ٱهۡتَدَيۡتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِيٓ إِلَيَّ رَبِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٞ قَرِيبٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul in ḍalaltu fa-innamā aḍillu ʿalā nafsī wa-ini ih'tadaytu fabimā yūḥī ilayya rabbī innahu samīʿun qarībun
